Articles.Content:
It seems Gravity isn't the only space movie with a semi-realistic coat.

There's also Europa Report about a manned mission to Europa.

Tbh it looks better than Gravity.

It seems Gravity isn't the only space movie with a semi-realistic coat.

There's also Europa Report about a manned mission to Europa.

Tbh it looks better than Gravity.

Looks like it could be as good as Moon, 2001, and 2010.
Oh, great, another horror film disguised as hard SF. Joy.

Hard SF isn't mutually exclusive with horror. Terrible things happen in reality, after all.

But I don't have good feelings about this movie judging from this trailer either. Much like Gravity, it starts out pretty cool, but then the horror feels a bit "ech". Gravity's trailer was worse about that, though (oh let's have a woman breathing REALLY hard over some explosions Ã¢â‚¬â€ this is horror/disaster film, people!)
